BCDServletModel

Class Calc

  • java.lang.Object
    • BCDServletModel.Calc

  • public class Calc
extends java.lang.Object
    The class which serves as the "model" branch of the MCV design program
    Version:
    1.4.1
    Author:
    Maciej Kajstura

    • Constructor Detail

      • Calc

        public Calc()
        A default contructor of Calc. Takes in no arguments, and sets the values of variables to zeroes. Uses convertToBCD(int number).

      • Calc

        public Calc(int firstInt_,
            int secondInt_)
        A contructor of Calc taking two arguments. Sets the values of variables to the taken values, while checking if those are positive numbers. Uses convertToBCD(int number).
        Parameters:
        firstInt_ - First value in the future calclulations.
        secondInt_ - Second value in the future calclulation.

    • Method Detail

      • setInput

        public void setInput(int value,
                     int index)
        Sets the value of one variable to given value. Takes in two values, respectively the future value, and the variable its' supposed to replace. Uses convertToBCD(int number).
        Parameters:
        value - Value which will be saved in the Calc object.
        index - Index of the spot it will be saved in.

      • getInputInt

        public int getInputInt(int index)
        Returns the [index] variable in the integer form.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the element program is looking for.
        Returns:
        Integer value of mentioned element.

      • getResultInt

        public int getResultInt()
        Return the result in the integer form.
        Returns:
        The calculation result in it's integer form.

      • getInput

        public java.util.ArrayList<int[]> getInput(int index)
        Returns the [index] variable in the BCD form.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the element program is looking for.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of integer arrays which represent mentioned above element in it's BCD form.

      • getResult

        public java.util.ArrayList<int[]> getResult()
        Returns the [index] variable in the BCD form.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of integer arrays which represent the result in it's BCD form.

      • calculation

        public java.util.ArrayList<int[]> calculation(EnumMode.Mode mode)
        Calculates two of the saved vars, and returns the result. The type of the calculation is chosen by the argument "mode". Uses the convertFromBCD method, and NegativeNumberException exception.
        Parameters:
        mode - The type of operation conducted.
        Returns:
        A ArrayList of int[] representing the operation result in it's BCD form.
